text: Nekhay zhe ne dumayutʹ ti, yaki vyyavlyayutʹ skupistʹ u tomu, shcho Allah daruvav yim zi Svoyeyi lasky, shcho tse krashche dlya nykh! Ta zh ni, tse hirshe dlya nykh. U Denʹ Voskresinnya te, na shcho vony skupylysya, povysne navkolo yikhnʹoyi shyyi! Allah — Spadkoyemetsʹ nebes ta zemli i Yomu vidomo te, shcho robyte vy
